text:
Apache doesn't work. In log file I found: (38)Function not implemented: 
Couldn't create accept lock"
creator: alexxxej@one.lv
jorton@redhat.com
text:
This typically happens when you're running a binary built for Linux 2.4 on Linux
2.2 kernel (or similar); don't do that - if you need the binary to run on >=
2.2, build on 2.2.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
I've seen this also with 2.4 builds on 2.6 (with posixsem iirc). May depend on
glibc.
Choosing another AcceptMutex is a workaround.
